item.title: Government shutdown ends as Trump signs bill, but DHS funding deadline looms
item.description: President Donald Trump signed legislation ending the partial government shutdown that began Friday, funding most agencies through September.

item.title: Republican 'wake-up call': Special election shocker highlights GOP turnout and midterm risks
item.description: Democrats score stunning upset in deep red Texas district Trump won by 17 points, delivering a major "wake-up call" to Republicans ahead of midterms.
